DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of an investigational drug in patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM) (a specific type of diabetes).
DOC.brief_title: MK0431 (Sitagliptin) and Metformin Co-Administration Factorial Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-036)
DOC.criteria: 54Week Base Study: Patients between the ages of 18 and 78 with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (a specific type of diabetes) 50Week Extension Study: Patients who complete the 54week base study are eligible to enter the 50week extension study Patients who do not have Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (a specific type of diabetes)
